basic_information.scholarship_name: John Taylor Beresford Endowed Scholarship for Computer Science

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Computer Science. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Must be enrolled full time 3.0 GPA or above Satisfactory progress in their area of study Â•Undergraduate student Computer Science major Two letters of faculty reference/support

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
